statements: SELECT store_name, location_point FROM StoreLocations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM StoreLocations WHERE target_demographics IS NOT NULL;
SELECT store_id, store_name, competitor_locations FROM StoreLocations WHERE store_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT store_name, location_point, target_demographics FROM StoreLocations WHERE location_point IS NOT NULL ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT store_id, store_name, competitor_locations FROM StoreLocations WHERE target_demographics LIKE '%young%' AND competitor_locations IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM StoreLocations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location_point.STAsText() AS location, target_demographics FROM StoreLocations WHERE target_demographics LIKE '%age%';

SELECT store_name, STDistance(location_point, geography::Point(37.7749, -122.4194)) AS distance_to_SF FROM StoreLocations WHERE location_point.STDistance(geography::Point(37.7749, -122.4194)) < 10000;
SELECT store_id, store_name, competitor_locations FROM StoreLocations WHERE competitor_locations IS NOT NULL ORDER BY store_name ASC;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location_point.Lat AS latitude, location_point.Long AS longitude FROM StoreLocations WHERE location_point.STDistance(geography::Point(40.7128, -74.0060)) < 5000;
SELECT * FROM new_store_locations;
SELECT location_name, demographic_data FROM new_store_locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT competitor_name, competitor_rating FROM competitor_data WHERE competitor_rating > 3 ORDER BY competitor_name ASC;
SELECT id, location_name FROM new_store_locations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT store_name FROM competitor_data;
SELECT id, location_name FROM new_store_locations WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM competitor_data WHERE competitor_rating > 3 ORDER BY store_name ASC;
SELECT id, location_name, jsonb_pretty(demographic_data) AS demographic_info FROM new_store_locations;
SELECT store_name, competitor_name, competitor_rating FROM competitor_data WHERE competitor_rating >= 4 ORDER BY competitor_rating DESC;
SELECT id, location_name, competitor_locations FROM new_store_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%mall%' OR location_name LIKE '%plaza%';
SELECT * FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_name, store_city, store_state FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_id, store_name, store_address, store_city, store_state, store_zipcode FROM store_locations WHERE store_state = 'California';
SELECT store_name, store_address, store_city FROM store_locations WHERE store_zipcode LIKE '94%';
SELECT store_id, store_name, store_city, store_state FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_state, store_city DESC;
SELECT store_name, store_city, store_state FROM store_locations WHERE store_state = 'California' ORDER BY store_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM store_locations WHERE store_city = 'New York' AND store_zipcode = '10001';
SELECT competitor_name, competitor_city, competitor_state FROM competitor_locations WHERE competitor_state = 'Texas' ORDER BY competitor_name ASC;
SELECT demographics_category, population, median_income FROM demographic_data WHERE population >= 100000 AND median_income >= 50000 ORDER BY population DESC, median_income ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM store_locations WHERE store_state = 'Washington' ORDER BY store_zipcode ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM potential_store_locations;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM potential_store_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT demographics_data FROM potential_store_locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT competitor_name, state, city FROM competitor_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, age, income, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM competitor_locations WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY competitor_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM potential_store_locations WHERE location_id > 1000;
SELECT competitor_name, city, state FROM competitor_locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, age, income, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT location_name, demographics_data FROM potential_store_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%mall%' AND demographics_data->>'gender' = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_name, city, state FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_id, address, zipcode FROM store_locations WHERE city='New York';
SELECT store_name, address, city, state, zipcode FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM competitor_locations WHERE state='CA' ORDER BY competitor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM store_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT store_name, address, city, state FROM store_locations WHERE state = 'CA' ORDER BY store_name ASC;
SELECT store_id, store_name, city, zipcode FROM store_locations WHERE state = 'TX' AND zipcode LIKE '75%' ORDER BY store_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM demographic_data WHERE education_level IN ('High School', 'College') AND population > 100000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, city, state, zipcode FROM competitor_locations WHERE state = 'IL' AND competitor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY competitor_name ASC;
